titles.title: Come Bless The Lord, All Ye Servants Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come bless the Lord, all ye servants of the Lord.
Who stand by night, in the house of the Lord.
Lift up your hands, in the holy place,
And bless the Lord, and bless the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come come my people, enter into my chamber
And shut the door around about thee
And hide thy self for a little moment
Till the indignation be over passed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bendecid a Jehova, siervos todos de Jehova,
Que se paran en la noche, en la casa de Jehova.
Levantad las manos en el santuario.
Y bendecid a Jehova, bendecid a Jehova.
